text: Behind the Scenes is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithBehind the ScenesBehind the Scenes: Where All Is Not Gold That Glitters and stars Florence Lawrence, Gladys Egan, and Kate Bruce. ==Actors== * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Bailey * Gladys Egan as Mrs. Bailey's Daughter * Kate Bruce * George Gebhardt as Member of Audience * Robert Harron as Messenger * Charles Inslee as Manager * George Nichols as The Doctor * Mack Sennett as Backstage Man ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Behind the Scenes (1908 movie)
